Rows.Name: Item_Fiber
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fiber-Description", "A bundle of soft fiber, highly useful.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fiber-FlavorText", "Fiber is collected from bast, the strong inner bark of certain flowering plants.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone-Description", "Chunks of sedimentary rock, easily worked.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone-FlavorText", "The geomorphology of Icarus has some similarities to Earth, but in many regards remains a mystery.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood-Description", "Roughly cut wooden timber, ready for the crafting bench.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood-FlavorText", "Adapted by terraformers to life on Icarus, Earth-origin trees flourish, and appear to grow more swiftly, possibly due to exotic matter.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stick
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stick-Description", "Small branches, easily fashioned into basic tools.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stick-FlavorText", "Whether making weapons or tools, a crafting bench or fuel, basic creation begins with the humble stick.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Floor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Floor-Description", "Rugged timber flooring, stronger if supported by beams.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Floor-FlavorText", "Durable if rudimentary flooring, prone to damage by Icarus\'s heavier weather. Notably prone to fire in lightning storms. Wooden structures can be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall-Description", "A roughly made wall, window or doorway (Hold \'R\' for variants).")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall-FlavorText", "Wood structures withstand light storms without damage. Can be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sulfur
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sulfur-Description", "A common, flammable ingredient for torches and gunpowder.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sulfur-FlavorText", "The tenth most common element in the universe, sulfur is essential for life, but also death, through its many different modes of incineration.")

Rows.Name: Item_Campfire
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Campfire-Description", "A place to cook food and fend the cold away.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Campfire-FlavorText", "One of the simplest sources of heat available on Icarus, the campfire burns sticks and wood to cook basic foods. Toxins in the planet\'s atmosphere do not interfere with combustion.")

Rows.Name: Item_Crafting_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crafting_Bench-Description", "A sturdy construction bench, though useless without shelter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crafting_Bench-FlavorText", "A heavy woodworking table that enables construction of improved tools, weapons and structural elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Door
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Door-Description", "A simply built wooden door.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Door-FlavorText", "Doors can be attached to doorways, once built.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Ramp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Ramp-Description", "A basic wooden ramp or roof.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Ramp-FlavorText", "A ramp or a roof, depending whose hands this element is in. Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Frame
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Frame-Description", "Frames distribute weight for stronger building and longer spans.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Frame-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Axe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Axe-Description", "A roughly-made axe, but fells trees well enough.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Axe-FlavorText", "The first step on a path that leads back to the 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Dev_Thor_Hammer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Dev_Thor_Hammer-Description", "Fly like a God, smell like a Dev.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Knife-Description", "A basic hunting tool, strong and sharp enough ... just.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Knife-FlavorText", "Icarus\'s unusually active tectonics provide a ready source of sedimentary rocks, making for easily knapped, sharp, but weak blades.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Spear-Description", "A light, resilient spear made of layered carbon fiber.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Spear-FlavorText", "Kills faster, lasts longer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Flare
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Flare-Description", "A longer burning source of light in the darkness.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Flare-FlavorText", "\'One thing about wearing a helmet, you don\'t notice your shack smells like Satan\'s armpit.\' ~ Sol Berlinski. (Activate with secondary attack.)")

Rows.Name: Item_Berry
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Berry-Description", "Berries will satisfy hunger, hydrate slightly, and extend endurance, but not for long.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Berry-FlavorText", "The intrepid prospector may also ferment wine, trusting that the quality of the resulting beverage is less important than the sheer fact of its existence.")

Rows.Name: Item_Waterskin
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Waterskin-Description", "A basic water bladder, not perfectly watertight.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Waterskin-FlavorText", "The waterskin\'s rough construction allows for rapid crafting, but loses water over time.")

Rows.Name: Item_Oxygen_Bladder
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxygen_Bladder-Description", "A simple airtight vessel for storing extra oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxygen_Bladder-FlavorText", "\'The Icarus nang.\' - Prospector joke")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Bow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Bow-Description", "A primitive bow with limited range and durability.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Bow-FlavorText", "A more rudimentary bow is hard to imagine, but will prove lethal in steady, patient hands.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Arrow-Description", "The most basic version of an ancient weapon.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Arrow-FlavorText", "Attempts to redesign the planet failed, but the terrazone nonetheless has a ready supply of raw ingredients for this \'rock on a stick\'.")

Rows.Name: Item_Charcoal
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Charcoal-Description", "Abundant after forest fires.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Charcoal-FlavorText", "Slightly lower oxygen levels result in burned carbon forming charcoal naturally.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Ore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Ore-Description", "Natural iron ore of high purity, easily smelted.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Ore-FlavorText", "Iron ore is plentiful in the planetary crust, as on Earth. Requires the high temperatures of a furnace to refine into pure ingots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Metal
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Metal-Description", "A refined ingot of iron.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Metal-FlavorText", "Iron may corode, but its ease of production makes it an ideal material on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Copper_Ore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Copper_Ore-Description", "Low grade copper ore, can be refined into pure ingots.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Copper_Ore-FlavorText", "The abundance of raw, high-quality metals on Icarus would have made it a goldmine, were it not so far removed from Earth.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Copper
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Copper-Description", "A pure ingot of copper, humanity\'s first metal.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Copper-FlavorText", "Easily worked, readily alloyed, a highly useful material for everything from weaponry to basic electronics.")

Rows.Name: Item_Gold_Ore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Gold_Ore-Description", "Gold ore returned from the depths of Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Gold_Ore-FlavorText", "In the future, Icarus\'s natural wealth offers many intriguing possibilities.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Gold
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Gold-Description", "A cold, golden ingot.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Gold-FlavorText", "The existence of exotics on Icarus has demoted gold to the status of a useful, shiny metal.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bauxite
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bauxite-Description", "Sedimentary bauxite with a high aluminium content.")

Rows.Name: Item_Aluminium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aluminium-Description", "A lightweight and easily milled ingot of aluminium.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aluminium-FlavorText", "\'I don\'t have aluminium foil on my windows any more.\' - Rick James")

Rows.Name: Item_Silica
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Silica-Description", "A key ingredient in concrete, glass and many other materials.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Silica-FlavorText", "The Silicon Age on Icarus is yet to arrive.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass-Description", "Despite its imperfections, a workable sheet of glass.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass-FlavorText", "Reflected in a sheet of glass is a simple fact: What looks familiar, is in fact a crystalline lattice unlike anything on Earth.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Water_Barrel
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Water_Barrel-Description", "A robust water storage solution.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Water_Barrel-FlavorText", "Keep it filled, stay alive.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Crate_Small
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Crate_Small-Description", "A modest wooden crate for storing small items.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Crate_Small-FlavorText", "Has 10 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Raw_Meat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Meat-Description", "Meat from a recently killed animal, worth cooking first.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Meat-FlavorText", "Transplanted from Earth, a range of genetically modified animals thrive in the terrazone, providing an energy-dense food source.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Meat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Meat-Description", "Can be eaten to satisfy hunger.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Meat-FlavorText", "Cooked meat is easier to digest and provides more nutrition than raw flesh.")

Rows.Name: Item_Spoiled_Meat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Spoiled_Meat-Description", "Animal flesh, considerably past its best-by date.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Spoiled_Meat-FlavorText", "You wouldn\'t be the first prospector desperate enough to eat this.")

Rows.Name: Item_Tree_Sap
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tree_Sap-Description", "A natural adhesive used in concrete and epoxy.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tree_Sap-FlavorText", "Whether you subscribe to the cohesion-tension or multiforce theories of sap transport, osmotic pressure gradients or axial potentials, it makes no difference to how useful it is.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather-Description", "Tanned and stretched animal skin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather-FlavorText", "Tanning stabilizes collagens, ensuring the skin does not rot when wet.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone-Description", "Useful for crafting basic tools and weapons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone-FlavorText", "One of the oldest crafting materials known to humanity, available on Icarus thanks to the last-minute genetic redesigns of Earth-native animals, which now thrive in the terrazone.")

Rows.Name: Item_Organic_Resin
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Organic_Resin-Description", "A natural and highly flexible bonding agent.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur-Description", "One of nature\'s more perfect insulation materials.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur-FlavorText", "Fur remains an exceptional material, especially in the terrazone, where temperatures are significantly cooler.")

Rows.Name: Item_Oxite
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxite-Description", "Can be refined into breathable oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxite-FlavorText", "A stable water-oxygen matrix, oxite slowly decomposes when exposed to the atmosphere of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Research2_Abyssal_Oxite
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Research2_Abyssal_Oxite-Description", "A unstable form of Oxite found deep underground")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Research2_Abyssal_Oxite-FlavorText", "You feel a weird burning sensation..")

Rows.Name: Item_Rope
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rope-Description", "Remains one of humanity\'s greatest inventions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rope-FlavorText", "A central element in crafting various construction materials and equipment.")

Rows.Name: Item_Epoxy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Epoxy-Description", "A basic but strong and hard-setting organic polymer.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Epoxy-FlavorText", "UDA safety guidelines recommend not breathing in the fumes.")

Rows.Name: Item_Gunpowder
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Gunpowder-Description", "Creating and solving problems for over one thousand years.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Gunpowder-FlavorText", "\'Not the best we could do, but not the worst either\' - Sol Berlinski")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Mix
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Mix-Description", "A rudimentary, but serviceable concrete analogue.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Mix-FlavorText", "Invented almost 8000 years ago, the composition of concrete has always varied depending on available resources and needs. Never was this more true than on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Knife-Description", "Stronger, lighter and sharper than its stone cousin. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Knife-FlavorText", "Did any UDA xenobiologist ever foresee that the bones of animals they adapted for life on Icarus would one day be used to fashion rudimentary hunting weapons?")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Spear-Description", "A bone blade improves melee damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Spear-FlavorText", "As most new arrivals on Icarus realise at some stage, there is a certain elegance to hunting an animal for its bones, in order to craft a more effective weapon to hunt further animals.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Arrow-Description", "A primitive arrow, dealing greater damage than stone.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Arrow-FlavorText", "In the mid-22nd century, the fletchers art is being rediscovered on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Longbow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Longbow-Description", "A powerful, but heavy long-range weapon.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Longbow-FlavorText", "Xeno-biologists hurriedly altered the genes of the tree from which this weapon is made, so that it might thrive on Icarus, never imagining that one day, a bow would be fashioned from it.")

Rows.Name: Item_Oxygen_Tank
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxygen_Tank-Description", "A small tank for storing and consuming oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Oxygen_Tank-FlavorText", "While plants and animals were genetically adjusted to deal with the impurities in Icarus\'s air, humans need to bring their own.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Knife-Description", "A short, clip-point blade for better defense and swifter skinning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Knife-FlavorText", "\'A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.\' -- Rabindranath Tagore")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Spear-Description", "An iron spearhead, improving defensive power and range.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Spear-FlavorText", "\'I throw a spear into the darkness. That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.\' -- Ingmar Bergman")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Axe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Axe-Description", "An iron axe, for swifter felling and hewing.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Axe-FlavorText", "\'Technological progress is like an axe in the hands of a pathological criminal.\' -- Albert Einstein")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Pickaxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Pickaxe-Description", "A strong iron pickaxe, for more rapid, reliable mining of basic stone.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Pickaxe-FlavorText", "An enduring if ironic icon of the so-called \'Exotics Rush\'.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Bolt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Bolt-Description", "A hard-hitting iron bolt, trading distance for damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Bolt-FlavorText", "Roughly 64,000 years since its first invention, the essential form of the bolt remains unchanged.")

Rows.Name: Item_Copper_Bolt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Copper_Bolt-Description", "Lightweight and strong, the copper bolt hits hard over distance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Canteen
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Canteen-Description", "A small, lightly-insulated water bottle.")

Rows.Name: Item_Crossbow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crossbow-Description", "Heavy hitting with a slow reload, so make it count.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crossbow-FlavorText", "\'The first time I held a crossbow, I was confused. How can you feel powerful and so medieval at the same time?\' -- Anton Chang")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_A
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_A-Description", "A high powered Crossbow that\'s quick to reload.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_A-FlavorText", "Great for sticky situations.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_B
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_B-Description", "The heavy draw on this weapon causes a slower reload, but adds far more damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_B-FlavorText", "Be careful where you point that thing.")

Rows.Name: Item_Lantern
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Lantern-Description", "A portable, biofuel-powered light, refueled by the composter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Lantern-FlavorText", "Fear not the dark.")

Rows.Name: Item_Machete
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Machete-Description", "A heavy duty blade, highly durable but less suitable for skinning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Machete-FlavorText", "Vanquishes flora and fauna alike.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Extractor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Extractor-Description", "A portable, powered mining unit for extracting exotics deposits.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Extractor-FlavorText", "Specifically designed to extract elanthium exotics. Operating tolerances not guaranteed for rarer exotic forms.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Concrete_Furnace
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Concrete_Furnace-Description", "An insulated, high-temperature furnace for smelting a wide range of materials including steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Concrete_Furnace-FlavorText", "Icarus\'s oxygen levels may slow combustion, but ceramic insulation produces temperatures sufficient for smelting more advanced alloys.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Furnace_V2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Furnace_V2-Description", "An insulated, high-temperature furnace for smelting a wide range of materials including steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Furnace_V2-FlavorText", "Icarus\'s oxygen levels may slow combustion, but ceramic insulation produces temperatures sufficient for smelting more advanced alloys.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Electric_Furnace
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Electric_Furnace-Description", "A laboratory grade arc furnace, smelts basic and advanced materials alike.")

Rows.Name: Item_Electric_Furnace_Large
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electric_Furnace_Large-Description", "A laboratory grade arc furnace, smelts basic and advanced materials alike.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Generator
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Generator-Description", "An efficient, if basic biofuel-driven electric generator.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Generator-FlavorText", "Literally or figuratively, we\'ve come a long way from the Faraday Disc.")

Rows.Name: Item_Shotgun
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shotgun-Description", "The reliable and timeless pump-action, savage at short range.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shotgun-FlavorText", "Ruin something\'s day, every day.")

Rows.Name: Item_Electronics
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electronics-Description", "A modular control unit, adaptable to most I/Os.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Round
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Round-Description", "Standard NATO 7.62mm cartridges.")

Rows.Name: Item_MetaResource
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_MetaResource-Description", "Exotic matter, an impossibility in your hands.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_MetaResource-FlavorText", "Previously believed to exist only in the heart of stars, the most common form of exotics, elanthium, has permitted extraordinary leaps in low temperature super conductors and high-density power storage.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Radar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Radar-Description", "A portable topographical radar unit. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Radar-FlavorText", "This inverse synthetic aperture radar was manufactured by Larkwell Martinez, a leading defense contractor with deep ties to the ACS.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Fiber
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Fiber-Description", "A lightweight, flexible construction material with high tensile strength.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Paste-Description", "A carbon-based admixture used in advanced constructions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Paste-FlavorText", "Don\'t leave Earth without it.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composite_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Paste-Description", "A high grade ferro-organic precursor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composites
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composites-Description", "An extremely strong, light and endurant construction material.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Pickaxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Pickaxe-Description", "Break rocks with stone.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Pickaxe-FlavorText", "The soft sedimentary rock scattered across Icarus\'s surface is easily shaped into useful tools. They may not be durable, but can be repaired easily enough.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Spear-Description", "Simple to make, easy to break.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Spear-FlavorText", "An effective defensive weapon, and erratic low range projectile, rapidly surpassed by improved versions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Flint_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flint_Arrow-Description", "Flies further, hits harder than stone or bone.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flint_Arrow-FlavorText", "Knappable flint provides a sharper arrowhead and greater penetration than stone or bone.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Arrow-Description", "A stronger arrow head, more durable than flint.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Arrow-FlavorText", "Tempered and fletched, the steel arrow has significant upsides over comparable alternatives.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Head-Description", "Headgear, providing some insulation and damage protection.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Chest
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Chest-Description", "A basic cuirass, gives limited insulation and damage protection")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Arms
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Arms-Description", "Gauntlets, providing basic protection and insulation.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Legs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Legs-Description", "Simple chausses, improving insulation and damage resistance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Feet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Feet-Description", "Roughly made boots, increase temperature and damage resistance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur_Head-Description", "Heavy, warm and moderately protective headgear.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur_Chest
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur_Chest-Description", "An armored fur jacket, giving warmth and reasonable damage protection.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur_Arms
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur_Arms-Description", "Heavy fur gloves, extremely warm with moderate physical protection.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur_Legs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur_Legs-Description", "Heavy, strengthened fur leg armor, warm and moderately protective.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fur_Feet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fur_Feet-Description", "Heavily insulated fur boots, offering moderate physical protection.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Stairs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Stairs-Description", "Roughly built wooden stairs.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Stairs-FlavorText", "Up, down, whatever.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Ladder
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Ladder-Description", "A rudimentary ladder, lashed together with fiber.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Oxite_Dissolver
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Oxite_Dissolver-Description", "A more efficient oxidizer for processing oxite into oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Oxite_Dissolver-FlavorText", "Place oxite and an appropriate container into the dissolver to start filling it. Requires sulfur for fuel.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Frame
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Frame-Description", "A heavy stone foundation, extends height and stability of constructions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Wall-Description", "Build stronger structures, unthreatened by fire.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Floor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Floor-Description", "Roughly hewn flagstones, unlikely to burn.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Ramp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Ramp-Description", "A sturdy stone ramp or roof to resist the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Stairs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Stairs-Description", "Stairs that may last longer than you.")

Rows.Name: Item_Reinforced_Door
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_Door-Description", "A heavy wooden door reinforced with iron bracing.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_Door-FlavorText", "Once your structure has a doorway, this heavy door can be attached.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Mortar_And_Pestle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Mortar_And_Pestle-Description", "A simple tool for crafting resins, pastes, medicines and more.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Mortar_And_Pestle-FlavorText", "The tool of chefs, herbalists, apothecaries and alchemists.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Wood_Cupboard
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Wood_Cupboard-Description", "A place to put necessities ... and the rest.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Wood_Cupboard-FlavorText", "Has 40 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Machining_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Machining_Bench-Description", "Upgrades your manufacturing abilities with basic machine tools.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit-Description", "An entry-level S5 life support system from Xigo, Earth\'s largest employer.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit-FlavorText", "In theory, a Xigo general issue \'Self-contained Surface Survival Suit System\' (S5) offers full body environmental containment and air processing. How many wore this before you is unclear. While no longer entirely air-tight, the suit should still provide sufficient protection to the average user.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Deluxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Deluxe-Description", "A rare, early-model First Cohort envirosuit, issued exclusively to pioneer prospectors on the planet.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Deluxe-FlavorText", "Originally issued by the UDA, these suits have subsequently become valuable collectors\' items. No longer available for purchase.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Shengong-Description", "Enhanced heat resistance with extended resource and module capacity.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Shengong-FlavorText", "Shengong\'s \'protextile\' system relies on ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastic \'cloth\', offering lightweight heat protection and rapid 3D printability.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Shengong_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Shengong_2-Description", "Offers reinforced insulation for cold-weather environments with extended resource and module capacity.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Shengong_2-FlavorText", "Shengong\'s \'protextile\' system relies on ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastic \'cloth\', offering lightweight protection and rapid 3D printability.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fire_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fire_Arrow-Description", "Share the warmth.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fire_Arrow-FlavorText", "\'One of the good things about being this far from Earth, there\'s no-one to tell you not to play with fire.\' - Sol Berlinski")

Rows.Name: Item_Combat_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Combat_Knife-Description", "A hardened sheepsfoot blade for the swiftest killing and skinning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Combat_Knife-FlavorText", "Stay sharp.")

Rows.Name: Item_Recurve_Bow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Recurve_Bow-Description", "With higher energy, recurve bows increase range and power.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Recurve_Bow-FlavorText", "Originating in ancient Scythia, the recurve bow stores energy more efficiently than a conventional bow, allowing for smaller, more compact weapons with an appreciable improvement in range and stopping power.")

Rows.Name: Item_Compound_Bow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Compound_Bow-Description", "Lightweight, long-range lethality.")

Rows.Name: Item_Aluminium_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aluminium_Arrow-Description", "A mid-grade, lightweight arrow giving decent range and damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aluminium_Arrow-FlavorText", "Sharp, savage, slightly barbed.")

Rows.Name: Item_Binoculars
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Binoculars-Description", "Simple to fabricate, 8x42 field glasses.")

Rows.Name: Item_Biofuel_Lamp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Biofuel_Lamp-Description", "A robust, portable biofuel-powered lamp.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Biofuel_Lamp-FlavorText", "Activate with secondary fire.")

Rows.Name: Item_Frag_Grenade
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Frag_Grenade-Description", "A basic fragmentation grenade design.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Frag_Grenade-FlavorText", "Homemade explosives are the best kind.")

Rows.Name: Item_Smoke_Grenade
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Smoke_Grenade-Description", "A canister grenade, used for drawing attention or concealing.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Arrow-Description", "Strength and lightness combined in one hard-hitting package.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composite_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Arrow-Description", "For power and weight, nothing compares.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composite_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Spear-Description", "Low weight, high strength, extreme damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Spear-FlavorText", "Bringing two thousand years of materials technology to a sharp stick, the composite spear is lethal at long range or close quarters.")

Rows.Name: Item_Flare_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flare_Arrow-Description", "Projects your position into the sky.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flare_Arrow-FlavorText", "The lost among us lean heavily on this launchable marker.")

Rows.Name: Item_Flashlight
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flashlight-Description", "An LED flashlight for illuminating dark corners.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flashlight-FlavorText", "Activate light with secondary fire.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fabricator
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fabricator-Description", "A marvel of survival technology.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fabricator-FlavorText", "Surprisingly simple for such a versatile machine, the Fabricator combines a flatbed CNC router with limited 3D alloy printing capabilities.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooking_Station
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooking_Station-Description", "A food preperation and butchering bench.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooking_Station-FlavorText", "While it may not deliver high cuisine, the Cooking Station rewards the attentions of an attentive chef with a swifter, more sustaining food supply.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooking_Station_V2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooking_Station_V2-Description", "A food preperation and butchering bench.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooking_Station_V2-FlavorText", "While it may not deliver high cuisine, the Cooking Station rewards the attentions of an attentive chef with a swifter, more sustaining food supply.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bean
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bean-Description", "Close to the perfect food source.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bean-FlavorText", "The argument over whether soy produces \'milk\' or \'juice\' rages into the 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carrot
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carrot-Description", "A carrot, like many before it.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carrot-FlavorText", "May improve accuracy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Flour
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flour-Description", "Ground wheat, ready for cooking.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wheat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wheat-Description", "Process into flour using the mortar and pestle, or add direct to composter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wheat-FlavorText", "An essential ingredient to basic foods and drinks. Whether baking bread or brewing beer, wheat is where it all begins.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Floor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Floor-Description", "Strong and stable, a floor that endures the worst Icarus can deliver.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Frame
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Frame-Description", "The strongest, most stable foundation for any structure.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Wall-Description", "Resilient, with high structural strength.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Ramp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Ramp-Description", "A high strength slope for roofing, supports great weight.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Road
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Road-Description", "Used to place roads.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Road-FlavorText", "To do.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composter
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composter-Description", "Rapidly decomposes organic matter into biofuel, which is collected by adding a biofuel can. Can be connected to a water network for increased processing speed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composter-FlavorText", "Requires a fuel can to be added to collect biofuel.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Stone_Furnace
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Stone_Furnace-Description", "A simple stone furnace for smelting iron and copper.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Stone_Furnace-FlavorText", "Bronze-age technology, spread to the stars.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Metal_Cupboard
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Metal_Cupboard-Description", "A robust storage solution.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Metal_Cupboard-FlavorText", "Has 50 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dev_Fireball
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dev_Fireball-Description", "Great ball \'o fire!")

Rows.Name: Item_Shell_Buckshot
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shell_Buckshot-Description", "Standard 12 gauge \"00\" buckshot.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dev_Inspection_Tool
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dev_Inspection_Tool-Description", "Left click to get information about the looked-at object. Right click to keep info about object on-screen.")

Rows.Name: Item_Proxy_Dropship
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Proxy_Dropship-Description", "Dropship")

Rows.Name: Item_Water_Pump
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Water_Pump-Description", "A small, but powerful axial-flow pump useful for creating water networks.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bed_Bedroll
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Bedroll-Description", "Once placed in shelter, a bed can be set as a respawn location. Can also be used to sleep through the night.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Bedroll-FlavorText", "\'A bed is where the soul returns after a night\'s travelling\' ~ Russian folk saying")

Rows.Name: Item_Bed_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Wood-Description", "Once placed in shelter, a bed can be set as a respawn location. Can also be used to sleep through the night.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Wood-FlavorText", "Rest, restore energy, respawn as required.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Deer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Deer-Description", "A genetically modified member of the cervid family.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Deer-FlavorText", "Modification of their respiratory system allows these deer variants to withstand - and thrive - despite Icarus\'s toxic atmosphere. Resources can be harvested by hand, but a skinning bench yields greater resources.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Skinning_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Skinning_Bench-Description", "Fully processes animal carcasses for more resources.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Skinning_Bench-FlavorText", "As any hunter knows, preparing an animal can be a slow, messy, wasteful task. The right tools make all the difference.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Roat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Roat-Description", "A specimen of local wildlife, rare in the terraformed zone.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Roat-FlavorText", "One of the rare endemic lifeforms able to survive in the failed terraforming zone, the roat endured the savage shift in Icarus\'s climate, due to its uniquely flexible respiratory system.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Wulv
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Wulv-Description", "A relative of the wolf, altered by exposure to exotic matter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Wulv-FlavorText", "This relative of the wolf, has been genetically warped by sustained exposure to exotic matter, which is believed to reactivate sections of so-called \'junk\' DNA.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sickle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sickle-Description", "An ancient, but efficient tool for harvesting from nature.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sickle-FlavorText", "Delivers more resources with each swipe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fireplace
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace-Description", "Cooks food swiftly and safely. Basically a large enclosed firepit, for a more homely feel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace-FlavorText", "On Icarus, fire is both friend and foe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Farming_CropPlot_T2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T2-Description", "A general-purpose planter bed for your crops Fully-grown crops left too long will eventually wither and only provide spoiled plants..")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T2-FlavorText", "A raised planting bed brings the food to you, slowly.")

Rows.Name: Item_Farming_CropPlot_T3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T3-Description", "A sturdy option for farming with water intake for faster crop growth. Fully-grown crops left too long will eventually wither and only provide spoiled plants.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T3-FlavorText", "Can be connected to a water network")

Rows.Name: Item_Farming_CropPlot_T4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T4-Description", "An advanced option for the busy farmer. Supports inputs from both Power and Water networks for increased crop growth speed. Fully-grown crops left too long will eventually wither and only provide spoiled plants.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Farming_CropPlot_T4-FlavorText", "Can be connected to both a water and a power network")

Rows.Name: Item_Material_Processor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Material_Processor-Description", "Swiftly craft advanced ingredients and resources.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Wall_Torch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Wall_Torch-Description", "A mounted flame for adorning shelter walls.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Wall_Torch-FlavorText", "Lower oxygen levels produce a dirty, but workable flame.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kit_Floor_Torch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Floor_Torch-Description", "A free-standing torch requiring sticks for fuel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kit_Floor_Torch-FlavorText", "Oxygen levels may be a little lower, but fire provides light well enough.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Axe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe-Description", "A mass-produced, but unremarkable hewing tool.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe-FlavorText", "Xigo specialises in high-end look at a low-end price.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe-Description", "A fancy name for a fairly ordinary mining device.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe-FlavorText", "There\'s a joke: \"Where Xigo goes, humanity is never far behind.\"")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife-Description", "A low grade, serviceable knife from \'the Purveyor of Everything\'")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife-FlavorText", "Whatever you kill with this blade doesn\'t need to know how little you paid.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Window-Description", "Open to let Icarus in, close to keep it out.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fishing_Trap
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fishing_Trap-Description", "Add bait, set, and wait.")

Rows.Name: Item_Raw_Fish
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Fish-Description", "Will nourish, but better if cooked.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Fish-FlavorText", "Salmon and trout required only slight genetic adjustment to thrive in the waterways of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Fish
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Fish-Description", "Nourishing, high in protein.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Rag_Torch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Rag_Torch-Description", "An easily crafted source of illumination.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Rag_Torch-FlavorText", "An ancient guiding light has found its place on Icarus, to keep the darkness at bay.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_RedGoat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_RedGoat-Description", "A natural survivor, thrives in arid climates.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_RedGoat-FlavorText", "One of the most successful transplants from Earth, the hardy red goat variant thrives on its adopted home.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fishing_Rod
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fishing_Rod-Description", "A basic fishing rod.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fishing_Rod-FlavorText", "Gone Fishin")

Rows.Name: Item_Shovel
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shovel-Description", "Shift snow, or bury a friend.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carpentry_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carpentry_Bench-Description", "Workbench and tools for advanced wooden crafting.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carpentry_Bench-FlavorText", "The rapid growth of trees on Icarus makes for noticeably less durable wooden creations.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carpentry_Bench_T4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carpentry_Bench_T4-Description", "Powered workbench and machine tools for advanced woodworking.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Refined-Description", "Processed, high quality timber for construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Floor_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Floor_Refined-Description", "Light wooden flooring, best used internally.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Floor_Refined-FlavorText", "Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Frame_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Frame_Refined-Description", "A wooden internal foundation structure.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Frame_Refined-FlavorText", "Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Wall_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall_Refined-Description", "A light wooden wall, best used internally.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall_Refined-FlavorText", "Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Ramp_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Ramp_Refined-Description", "A light ramp, best used internally.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Ramp_Refined-FlavorText", "Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Snow_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Snow_Wolf-Description", "A savage pack hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Snow_Wolf-FlavorText", "Ever adaptable, the snow wolf variant endures where little else survives.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Door_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Door_Refined-Description", "A light wooden door, best suited to internal use.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Door_Refined-FlavorText", "Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Bear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Bear-Description", "Highly aggressive and territorial.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Bear-FlavorText", "Within the zone of failed terraforming, little can challenge the grizzly variant as an apex predator. Outside the zone, however, is another matter.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_RockDog
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_RockDog-Description", "[DNT} Rockdog Carcass")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_RockDog-FlavorText", "[DNT} Rockdog Carcass")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Raccoon
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Raccoon-Description", "As on Earth, a survivor, but not today")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Raccoon-FlavorText", "The raccoon strain has found a new niche on this malformed environment.")

Rows.Name: Item_Ice
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Ice-Description", "Frozen water, can be melted for drinking.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Ice-FlavorText", "Store in a chilly bin or add to a campfire, with a water vessel, to collect drinkable water.")

Rows.Name: Item_FireExtinguisher
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FireExtinguisher-Description", "A canister of compressed flame-extinguishing gel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FireExtinguisher-FlavorText", "The instructions say: \'Aim towards flame.\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Reinforced_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_Window-Description", "A braced and bolstered wooden window.")

Rows.Name: Item_Table_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Table_Wood-Description", "A wooden table, like so many before it.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Table_Wood-FlavorText", "It\'s possible that the entirety of human culture can be extrapolated from the existence of tables.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Chamois_M
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Chamois_M-Description", "A tough, fleet-footed variant of Earth\'s goat-antelope.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Chamois_M-FlavorText", "Terraforming failed, leaving a wasteland at ground zero, into which Earth-like forests and their natural inhabitants spread rapidly and easily.")

Rows.Name: Item_FireWhacker
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FireWhacker-Description", "Quickly beats out fires.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FireWhacker-FlavorText", "Discovered in prehistory, the fire whacker represents an effective, if unsophisticated tactic: Attack the flames until they surrender.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Crate_Medium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Crate_Medium-Description", "Store, share and protect items and resources.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Crate_Medium-FlavorText", "Has 20 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Chair_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Chair_Wood-Description", "A robust, rustic wooden seat.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Chair_Wood-FlavorText", "Driven by the demands and scarcity of life on the surface, a recognizable \'Icarus vernacular\' has swiftly emerged, spanning many forms of design, with furniture being no exception.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Ext
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Ext-Description", "Send the smoke skyward.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Ext-FlavorText", "\'Sometimes it felt like I had joined a rustic interior decoration cult\' - M. Le Baroni")

Rows.Name: Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap-Description", "The final step in a fireplace.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap_Half
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap_Half-Description", "The final half-sized step in a fireplace.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Wall_Angle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall_Angle-Description", "Angular inserts for gables and other tilted designs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Wall_Angle_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Wall_Angle_Refined-Description", "Angular inserts for interior construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Railing
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Railing-Description", "A rough, but serviceable wooden railing.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Elephant
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Elephant-Description", "Near extinct on Earth, enduring on Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Elephant-FlavorText", "Almost vanished on Earth, the Indian elephant was brought to Icarus to improve its chances of survival.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Railing_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Railing_Refined-Description", "A light wooden railing for internal construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Railing_Gate_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Railing_Gate_Refined-Description", "A light wooden railing gateway for interior use.")

Rows.Name: Item_Worklamp_Directional
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Worklamp_Directional-Description", "A basic lamp for illuminating a large area.")

Rows.Name: Item_Worklamp_OmniDirectional
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Worklamp_OmniDirectional-Description", "A basic lamp for illuminating a large area.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_TrapDoor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_TrapDoor-Description", "A rough wooden hatch.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_TrapDoor-FlavorText", "Attaches to a floor trapdoor structure.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sponge
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sponge-Description", "A useful herbal ingredient, and holds a small amount of water.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Sign_Small
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Sign_Small-Description", "Places writeable signage.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Compass
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Compass-Description", "An inertial compass system for an Envirosuit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Compass-FlavorText", "Equip in a module slot to activate your Envirosuit\'s Compass Module.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Waypoint
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Waypoint-Description", "A GPS-based unit for setting and managing waypoints.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Waypoint-FlavorText", "Equip in an module slot to enable waypoint marking.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Player_Status
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Player_Status-Description", "An interconnected biometric telemetry unit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Player_Status-FlavorText", "Equip in an module slot to monitor team status info.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Player_Tracker
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Player_Tracker-Description", "Provides realtime location data on team members.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Player_Tracker-FlavorText", "Equip in a module slot to view your team members on the map.")

Rows.Name: Item_Lily
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Lily-Description", "A wildflower reputed to have medicinal properties.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Lily-FlavorText", "Adapting to the exotics-infused soil of Icarus, this lily has acquired unusual and useful new chemical properties.")

Rows.Name: Item_Reed_Flower
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reed_Flower-Description", "A wildflower reputed to have medicinal properties.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reed_Flower-FlavorText", "Transplanting this reed to alien soil has altered its bioactive properties considerably.")

Rows.Name: Item_Canteen_Lightweight
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Canteen_Lightweight-Description", "A lightweight vessel for holding water, has a small thermal protection layer, to keep the water cold.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_TrapDoor_Refined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_TrapDoor_Refined-Description", "A light wooden hatch.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_TrapDoor_Refined-FlavorText", "Attaches to a floor trapdoor structure. Less durable than basic wooden construction elements, refined materials will make your lumber go further, but require protection from the elements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refrigerator
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refrigerator-Description", "Preserves food from spoilage when powered.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refrigerator-FlavorText", "The Xigo-designed Skift fridge maintains an optimum four degrees.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier2-Description", "A general issue S5 envirosuit with extended life support systems.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier2-FlavorText", "The Xigo S5-II is a full-spectrum environmental protection jumpsuit, helmet and life-support system, offering an augment slot and extended oxygen capacity.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier3-Description", "An enhanced and lightly armored S5 envirosuit offering more functionality and life support systems than the S5-II.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier3-FlavorText", "The Xigo S5-X is a surprisingly high-spec unit for the price. A complete survival system, it features basic rebreather technology and ultra-high-density polyethylene construction, reducing weight and increasing strength.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier4-Description", "An upgraded S5-II suit with expanded resource storage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier4-FlavorText", "On Earth they judge you by your shoes, on Icarus by your Envirosuit.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier5
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier5-Description", "A lightweight HDPE S5 Envirosuit providing expanded upgrade slots, light armor and respectable storage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier5-FlavorText", "Plastic\'s come a long way since Tupperware")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier6
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier6-Description", "A lightly armored, double-module S5 suit with micro-texturing to reduce reflectivity.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier6-FlavorText", "A 2124 survey registered the Xigo \'X\' as one of the most widely-recognized symbols in the world.")

Rows.Name: Item_Envirosuit_Tier7
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier7-Description", "A broad spectrum, armored S5 envirosuit with dual module slots and decent resource capacity.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Envirosuit_Tier7-FlavorText", "Originally a website for price comparisons, the Xigo conglomerate grew to embrace distribution and, not long after, production. This was a seemingly indiscriminate expansion, focused not on one industry, but all of them - taking in so many fields that business analysts have largely rejected the idea of Xigo as a single entity. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_BabyDeer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BabyDeer-Description", "Far from Earth, further from help.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BabyDeer-FlavorText", "Lightyears from Earth, the corpse of a baby dear somehow retains an echo of the tragic.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Frame
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Frame-Description", "An extremely stable foundation for construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Sniper
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Sniper-Description", "Heavy hitting, far reaching.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Hunting
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Hunting-Description", "A semi-automatic rifle, ideal for big game hunting.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Hunting-FlavorText", "An ancient hand-wrought weapon design, adapted to a new frontier.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Assault
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Assault-Description", "Quantity over quality.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Ghillie_Head-FlavorText", "Take the effort out of hunting.")

Rows.Name: Item_Building_UpgradeTool
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Building_UpgradeTool-Description", "Improve your structures without tearing them down.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Building_UpgradeTool-FlavorText", "Allows you to replace an existing structural piece for an advanced version, if you have that item in your inventory. Hold \'R\" when holding the tool.")

Rows.Name: Item_Yeast
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Yeast-Description", "A sugary herb, rich in natural yeasts. Add to a cooking ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Yeast-FlavorText", "Technically a fungus, yeast is a unicellular microbe of the genus Saccharomyces, seemingly unaffected by Icarus\'s toxic atmosphere. Add to mortar and pestle with flour and water from a container to make dough.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bread-Description", "Wholesome, filling and slow to spoil.")

Rows.Name: Item_Flatbread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flatbread-Description", "Longlasting and healthful.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Flatbread-FlavorText", "Simple to bake and easy to store, boosts health and stamina regen.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dough_Bread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dough_Bread-Description", "Makes bread, just add to a fire.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dough_Flatbread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dough_Flatbread-Description", "Makes flatbread, just add to a fire.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dough_Flatbread-FlavorText", "Lightyears from the Levant.")

Rows.Name: Item_Beer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Beer-Description", "Proving you can brew beer from just about anything.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Beer-FlavorText", "Warms the body, soothes the soul, increases regeneration rates.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wine
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wine-Description", "One of humanity\'s oldest inventions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wine-FlavorText", "You\'re four billion kilometers from Earth, but some things never change. Wine stops the pain, increases stamina and health regen.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Bottle_Beer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Bottle_Beer-Description", "A small, empty glass bottle. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Dev_Bug_Tool
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dev_Bug_Tool-Description", "Left click to get create a new Jira Bug for the current object selected")

Rows.Name: Item_Pistol_Handgun
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pistol_Handgun-Description", "A serviceable 9mm handgun.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pistol_Handgun-FlavorText", "Icarus is open carry.")

Rows.Name: Item_Pistol_Round
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pistol_Round-Description", "Reliable 9mm ammunition.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_PolarBear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_PolarBear-Description", "Emperor of the ice, highly aggressive.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_PolarBear-FlavorText", "After the Climate Emergency on Earth, the polar bear was approaching extinction. On Icarus, its variant has found a home on the planet\'s newly-formed artic zones.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Bottle_Wine
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Bottle_Wine-Description", "A large, empty glass bottle.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Crate_Small-FlavorText", "Has 15 storage slots.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Crate_Medium-FlavorText", "Has 25 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Round_Incendiary
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_Round_Incendiary-Description", "Explosive 7.62mm ammunition.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_Round_Armor_Piercing

Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Character_Crafting-Description", "Unlocks crafting.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composite_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Head-Description", "Heavy HDP armor with unmatched impact protection and insulation.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Head-FlavorText", "Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure. ")

Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Chest-Description", "Heavy HDP armor with unmatched impact protection and insulation.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Chest-FlavorText", "Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Head-Description", "High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Head-FlavorText", "A high-tech balance of physical protection, lightweight nano-construction, energy absorbance and protection against extremes of temperature.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Chest
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Chest-Description", "High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Chest-FlavorText", "Two hundred times stronger than steel and extraordinarily conductive, the IO suit\'s graphene weave allows it to dissipate energy with near-perfect efficiency.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Arms
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Arms-Description", "High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Arms-FlavorText", "Focused on energy absorbance rather than outright hardness, the material\'s graphene multi-layered construction bleeds impact energy away almost instantly.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Legs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Legs-Description", "High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Legs-FlavorText", "A product of zero-g manufacturing techniques, this semi-rigid mid-weight graphene protextile is renowned for protecting against micro-meteorites travelling at upward of 10km/sec.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Feet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Feet-Description", "High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Feet-FlavorText", "Norex is a \'grey\' research venture between \'old world\' ACS companies Norsec and mining giant ExMin.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composter_Wood

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composter_Wood-FlavorText", "Reduce, reuse, recycle")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Creature_Tracker
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Creature_Tracker-Description", "Equipping this item to an Auxiliary slot will allow you to see all alive creatures")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Oxite_Dissolver
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Oxite_Dissolver-Description", "A faster and more efficient, biofuel-powered oxidizer with greater storage.")

Rows.Name: Item_Building_RepairTool
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Building_RepairTool-Description", "Maintain or upgrade your structures against the wrath of Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Building_RepairTool-FlavorText", "Quickly beat dislodged planks back into place, or replace those planks with sturdier materials, a single hammer does it all!")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Lion_F
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Lion_F-Description", "The second most dangerous thing in the desert.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Lion_F-FlavorText", "Introduced to manage the population of smaller mammals, the lion variant adopted swiftly to the arid regions of the new Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Cougar_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Cougar_Alpha-Description", "The second most dangerous thing in the desert.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Cougar_Alpha-FlavorText", "Introduced to manage the population of smaller mammals, the lion variant adopted swiftly to the arid regions of the new Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Hedgehog_Medium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Hedgehog_Medium-Description", "A medium sized hedgehog-style defensive structure.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Hedgehog_Medium-FlavorText", "Hedgehogs may have been left on Earth but the lessons they tought will serve us well on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Scorpion_Hedgehog_Medium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Scorpion_Hedgehog_Medium-Description", "A medium sized hedgehog-style defensive structure with poisonous stingers for extra damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Scorpion_Hedgehog_Medium-FlavorText", "How the tables have turned")

Rows.Name: Item_Scorpion_Trap_Medium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Scorpion_Trap_Medium-Description", "Similar to a bear trap, this is one device you do NOT want to stand on. Can be reset after activation.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Scorpion_Trap_Medium-FlavorText", "Be sure to give it a wide berth")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Beam
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Beam-Description", "Anchors structures to the ground for higher building.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Beam-FlavorText", "Beams connect vertically and diagonally to support multi-level construction. Your HUD will indicate when beams are anchored with a blue cursor.")

Rows.Name: Item_SplineTool_Electricity
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_SplineTool_Electricity-Description", "A tool to help create and connect Electricity networks.")

Rows.Name: Item_SplineTool_Water
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_SplineTool_Water-Description", "A tool to help create and connect Water networks.")
